ygData.subject: Re: Hello, I am new here
ygData.msgSnippet: /rant Hate the message length monster at 13 I went to Unrest. Great XP, good loot, and I got chain armor dropped off the ghouls there. I lvled from 13
ygData.messageBody:
/rant Hate the message length monster <br><br>at
13 I went to Unrest. Great XP, good loot, and I got
chain armor dropped off the ghouls there. I lvled from
13 to 15 in 2 days in there. And it's not so far to
go home to Kelethin.<br><br>I don't know about you
but when i've been traveling I feel so good when I
see the port at BB. And much better when I first
sight the tree city rising in the distance. Ahhh!
Kelethin none other makes me happy.<br><br>LOL, I think
i've been playing too long
